text: Ameurfina Aguinaldo Melencio-Herrera (11 May 1922 - 12 October 2020) was a Filipino judge. She served as an Associate Justice of the Philippine Supreme Court from 1979 until her retirement in 1992. She was the second woman appointed to the Supreme Court, filling the vacancy left by the retirement of the first female Supreme Court Justice, Cecilia Mu√±oz-Palma. Melencio-Herrera died in Cabanatuan on 12 October 2020, aged 98.Ex-SC Justice Ameurfina Melencio-Herrera dies ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino judges Category:People from Nueva Ecija
title: Ameurfina Melencio-Herrera
